attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to ban conversion therapy and make it illegal to hold conversion therapy for transgender people, and also make it illegal for people to force transgender people into conversion therapy. It is an act against transgender people’s identity, hurting LGBTQ+ community’s.
attributes.background: The government should ban transgender conversion therapy, this is an act against human rights

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
